argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | iscgrg.p | |- P = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | iscgrg.m | |- .- = ( dist ` G ) |
| 3 |  | iscgrg.e | |- .~ = ( cgrG ` G ) |
| 4 |  | iscgrgd.g | |- ( ph -> G e. V ) |
| 5 |  | iscgrgd.d | |- ( ph -> D C_ RR ) |
| 6 |  | iscgrgd.a | |- ( ph -> A : D --> P ) |
| 7 |  | iscgrgd.b | |- ( ph -> B : D --> P ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` G ) e. _V |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_eqeltri | |- P e. _V |
| 10 |  | #P_reex | |- RR e. _V |
| 11 |  | #P_elpm2r | |- ( ( ( P e. _V /\ RR e. _V ) /\ ( A : D --> P /\ D C_ RR ) ) -> A e. ( P ^pm RR ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 10, 11 | #P_mpanl12 | |- ( ( A : D --> P /\ D C_ RR ) -> A e. ( P ^pm RR ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 5, 12 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> A e. ( P ^pm RR ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_elpm2r | |- ( ( ( P e. _V /\ RR e. _V ) /\ ( B : D --> P /\ D C_ RR ) ) -> B e. ( P ^pm RR ) ) |
| 15 | 9, 10, 14 | #P_mpanl12 | |- ( ( B : D --> P /\ D C_ RR ) -> B e. ( P ^pm RR ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 5, 15 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> B e. ( P ^pm RR ) ) |
| 17 | 13, 16 | #P_jca | |- ( ph -> ( A e. ( P ^pm RR ) /\ B e. ( P ^pm RR ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_biantrurd | |- ( ph -> ( ( dom A = dom B /\ A. i e. dom A A. j e. dom A ( ( A ` i ) .- ( A ` j ) ) = ( ( B ` i ) .- ( B ` j ) ) ) <-> ( ( A e. ( P ^pm RR ) /\ B e. ( P ^pm RR ) ) /\ ( dom A = dom B /\ A. i e. dom A A. j e. dom A ( ( A ` i ) .- ( A ` j ) ) = ( ( B ` i ) .- ( B ` j ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_fdm | |- ( A : D --> P -> dom A = D ) |
| 20 | 6, 19 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> dom A = D ) |
| 21 |  | #P_fdm | |- ( B : D --> P -> dom B = D ) |
| 22 | 7, 21 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> dom B = D ) |
| 23 | 20, 22 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ph -> dom A = dom B ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_biantrurd | |- ( ph -> ( A. i e. dom A A. j e. dom A ( ( A ` i ) .- ( A ` j ) ) = ( ( B ` i ) .- ( B ` j ) ) <-> ( dom A = dom B /\ A. i e. dom A A. j e. dom A ( ( A ` i ) .- ( A ` j ) ) = ( ( B ` i ) .- ( B ` j ) ) ) ) ) |
| 25 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_iscgrg | |- ( G e. V -> ( A .~ B <-> ( ( A e. ( P ^pm RR ) /\ B e. ( P ^pm RR ) ) /\ ( dom A = dom B /\ A. i e. dom A A. j e. dom A ( ( A ` i ) .- ( A ` j ) ) = ( ( B ` i ) .- ( B ` j ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 26 | 4, 25 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( A .~ B <-> ( ( A e. ( P ^pm RR ) /\ B e. ( P ^pm RR ) ) /\ ( dom A = dom B /\ A. i e. dom A A. j e. dom A ( ( A ` i ) .- ( A ` j ) ) = ( ( B ` i ) .- ( B ` j ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 27 | 18, 24, 26 | #P_3bitr4rd | |- ( ph -> ( A .~ B <-> A. i e. dom A A. j e. dom A ( ( A ` i ) .- ( A ` j ) ) = ( ( B ` i ) .- ( B ` j ) ) ) ) |
